pr_title: TRUNK-4830 Avoid running legacy liquibase changesets

timeline.message: TRUNK-4830 add custom Liquibase change and refactor demo data

timeline.author: dkayiwa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 	 * 
 	 * This constant needs to be updated when adding new Liquibase update files to openmrs-core.
 	 */
-	private static final int CHANGE_SET_COUNT_FOR_2_1_X = 863;

replies.bodyText: The generated core-data snapshots contained inserts for the global_property table. The actual data was added to the database by Java classes and not by the original Liquibase change logs. So that change set was removed again.
replies.author: WolfSchlegel
